backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining feature specs, domain types, storage maps, and role management skeleton via access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature requirements to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for numerous frontend components, hooks, pages, and docs.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation of auth flow, role model, and how frontend queries backend for user roles and persisted data.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design guide describing the dark‑fantasy theme, colors, typography, spacing, and interaction styles.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Documentation of localStorage schema, canister-backed data, React Query invalidation, and offline mutation handling.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists Phase 1 and future features for each site page, outlining required components and planned enhancements.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Defines project architecture, sitemap, access levels, and Phase 1 feature scope for the application.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up metadata and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, lazy-loaded pages, React Query config, and global layout for the app.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Displays a grid of team member flip cards showing profiles and bios.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Renders a vertical milestone timeline with themed styling and year-based entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Provides an admin view for listing and filtering orders with loading states and search inputs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: UI for admins to create, edit, and update product stock using queued mutations with validation and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Provides forms for granting and revoking admin roles via queued mutations with principal validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with session clearing and status handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile setup modal allowing users to submit name and email via a mutation before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Route guard that checks authentication and admin role, showing appropriate access or error screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Simple auth gate that requires user login before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: FAQ section rendering a list of collapsible question‑answer items.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GuildO: Displays guild orders with loading, error, empty, and populated states using data from a query.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invent: Manages cart display and checkout flow, combining cart items with product data and handling order creation.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Wraps content in a fade‑in effect triggered on scroll, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Provides an accessible flip‑card UI component with motion reduction support.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Applies a scroll‑based parallax transform to wrapped content unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Renders a static list of announcement cards with titles, dates, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Implements a simple carousel showcasing featured items with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Displays a grid of navigational cards linking to major site sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the global app layout with header, footer, background layers, and offline sync indicator.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with quick links, legal info, branding, and external attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides responsive site navigation with mobile menu, role‑based links, and login handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Layout wrapper that renders optional title/description and child content with styling classes.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Accordion component listing predefined service items with icons, summaries, details, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Dialog modal displaying product details with actions to save items, add to cart, and show stock status.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Hook that filters products by a search query using name and description matching.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Component showing an error or offline state with retry support and contextual messaging.
frontend/src/components/system/OfflineSy: Dialog for viewing, retrying, and managing offline mutation queue entries with status indicators.
Floating status UI showing real-time offline sync progress, errors, and queue access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and status using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to track when an element enters the viewport, optionally only once.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a local cart stored in localStorage with add, remove, update, and utility helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Stores and retrieves expiring offline form drafts in localStorage by form ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineMutationRep: Replays queued offline mutations when online, retrying certain errors and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects user preference for reduced motion via matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, orders, and related actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Wraps mutations to enqueue them for offline execution when no actor is available, updating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Manages a recently viewed products list in localStorage with add and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Custom React hook that persists state to localStorage with session IDs and 24‑hour expiry.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme and utility styles defining colors, typography, animations, and layout helpers.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Utility for versioned, expiring, and safely-handled localStorage reads and writes.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Manages a versioned localStorage-backed queue for offline mutations with retry and failure tracking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, InternetIdentity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying mission, values, and team sections with animated cards and layout components.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin panel page with tabbed navigation for managing products, orders, and users behind admin auth.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Blog listing page rendering lore-themed posts with cards, metadata, and fade-in effects.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Implements a contact form with local state, simulated submission, and UI components for sending messages. Includes layout, animations, and a FAQ section.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Builds a user dashboard with tabs for profile, orders, saved items, cart, and quests, using various data-fetching hooks and conditional UI states. Handles identity checks, loading, errors, and product mapping.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Displays a searchable FAQ list using an accordion UI, filtering questions across categories. Uses layout and animation wrappers for presentation.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with a hero section, featured carousel, quick links, and feature highlights. Incorporates parallax effects and multiple custom components.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Shows a detailed privacy policy divided into sections with headings and separators. Presented within a card layout and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Provides a services overview with an accordion for service details and a call‑to‑action for custom service inquiries. Uses structured layout and animations.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Renders the shop page with product listing, filters, view modes, saved-state checks, and a modal for product details using data from queries.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Displays static Terms of Service content inside a styled layout with sectioned text and separators.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session-based parameters, including hash-route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, animations, colors, and plugins for the project's styling system.
project_state.json: Describes the project's phase, architecture plans, known issues, and existing feature definitions for ongoing development.
